title: Oil Extends Gain as Traders Focus on Iran Risks and Venezuela
description: Oil extended a gain as the market weighed President Donald Trump’s threat against Iran, while focusing on US measures to exert control over Venezuela’s exports and energy sector.
content: Oil extended a gain as the market weighed President Donald Trump’s threat against Iran, while focusing on US measures to exert control over Venezuela’s exports and energy sector.
